scripts.clean: rm -rf SpaceRadar-darwin-x64 SpaceRadar-darwin-arm64 SpaceRadar-darwin-universal SpaceRadar-linux-x64 SpaceRadar-win32-x64 builds
scripts.build: npm run build:mac && npm run build:linux && npm run build:win
scripts.zip: npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:mac: mkdir -p builds && cd SpaceRadar-darwin-x64 && zip -ryX ../builds/SpaceRadar-darwin-x64.zip SpaceRadar.app
scripts.zip:mac-arm64: mkdir -p builds && cd SpaceRadar-darwin-arm64 && zip -ryX ../builds/SpaceRadar-darwin-arm64.zip SpaceRadar.app
scripts.zip:mac-universal: mkdir -p builds && cd SpaceRadar-darwin-universal && zip -ryX ../builds/SpaceRadar-darwin-universal.zip SpaceRadar.app
scripts.everything: npm run install && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
